vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Brown Reynolds Watford Architects, Inc. for architectural and engineering services for the schematic design, design development, construction documents, bidding and negotiation, and construction administration for the renovation of two recreation center facilities: Arcadia Recreation Center located at 5420 Arcadia Drive and Eloise Lundy Recreation Center located at 1228 Reverend CBT Smith Street - Total not to exceed $223,197.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2024 General Obligation Bond Fund)
vote.description: Authorize a professional services contract with Brown Reynolds Watford Architects, Inc. for architectural and engineering services for the schematic design, design development, construction documents, bidding and negotiation, and construction administration for the renovation of two recreation center facilities: Arcadia Recreation Center located at 5420 Arcadia Drive and Eloise Lundy Recreation Center located at 1228 Reverend CBT Smith Street - Total not to exceed $223,197.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2024 General Obligation Bond Fund)
